review.description: Found the sweet Chili stand at the Urban Space Festival and the redish cake was soooooo delicious after 30 minutes walking I had to go back to get another one :) Had a nice chat with Fred and I learned that his dauhter was the runner up of Top Chef Season 4. Amzazingly the when I went back the next day guess who was there ? Right Lisa herself ! We chatted a little and I even got an autograph. Overall the team and food at Sweet Chili are awesome ! The team friendly and professional the food tasty and delicious ! Really highly recommend either at the Urban Space Festival or at the foodtruck. Just check the website http://www.sweetchilinyc.com/#home2. Thanks guys for a great time and wonderful food ! Keep it up ! See you next time on my vacation !
review.author: Martina S.
